Parameters.Name: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: Correct response - there is 1 profile and one ADC

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: Correct response - there is 3 profile, Only 2 of them has ADC. and 1 ADC in audioDecoderConfCompleteList
Test.Description: 1st and 3rd profile has the same ADC (ADC token = ADC1)

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: Correct response - there is 1 profile and 3 ADC. Only one ADC is returned on GetADC with specified ProfileToken

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: Correct response - there is 1 profile and 3 ADC. 3 ADC is returned on GetADC with specified ProfileToken

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: There is empty profileList and one ADC

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: There is 1 profile without ADC and 1 ADC in audioDecoderConfCompleteList. One ADC is returned in GetADC when PtofileToken specified

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: In first GetAudioDecoderConfigurations audioDecoderConfList is empty
Test.Description: If audioDecoderConfCompleteList is empty, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: there is 2 ADC with the same token in GetAudioDecoderConfigurations
Test.Description: If audioDecoderConfCompleteList contains at list two items with the same @token, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: audioDecoderConfList is empty

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: audioDecoderConfList contains more than one item

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: audioDecoderConfList does not contain item with @token = audioDecoderConfiguration.@token, FAIL the test and skip other steps

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: audioDecoderConfList contains at list two items with the same @token

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: audioDecoderConfCompleteList does not contain at least one item with @token from audioDecoderConfList

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: audioDecoderConfList does not contain item with @token = profile.Configurations.AudioDecoder.@token

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: GetADC with profile specified return 2 AOC 1 of them not exist in AOC completeList
Test.Description: If audioDecoderConfCompleteList does not contain at least one item with @token from audioDecoderConfList, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.TestName: Audio Decoder Configuration – Get Audio Decoder Configurations
Test.Name: audioDecoderConfList does not contain item with @token = profile.Configurations.AudioDecoder.@token
